short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will get a users ESPN API keys for accessing private leagues. These keys can be used by websites to access ESPN APIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow users to retrieve crucial keys needed to access leagues via API.  This will allow websites to access private league data for a user.
